title: Trump, two sons, Trump Org sue IRS, Treasury for $10 billion over tax records leak
summary_full: The Miami federal court lawsuit says the IRS and Treasury failed to prevent the leak of Trumps tax records by former IRS employee Charles Littlejohn.
summary_public: The Miami federal court lawsuit says the IRS and Treasury failed to prevent the leak of Trumps tax records by former IRS employee Charles Littlejohn.
